attributes.action: Allow parents to discipline their children by spanking using impliments
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As far as I am aware, the current law states that parents are able to use 'reasonable chastisement' on their children.  I believe that if parents were able to spank using an impliment, for example a cane or slipper the country would not be in the state it's in today
